summary: Balances the pricing of books and notes
descriptionHtml:
This mod is the first step in my Skyrim Economic Rebalance mod series (SER) It is an attempt to balance the value of items in Skyrim to better reflect the lore game world.

Currently using a simple x4 method to increase the value of books and notes. This mod is still in development and could use you're testing and feed back!

Check out all my mods!

Skyrim

Sliders timescale fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8289
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8151

Skyrim Economics Rebalanced (SER)
Master mod: SER Market fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9900
or on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11850

author: MD Wolfe
